name: ExposureRiskToEnvironmentalHazards
title: Exposure Risk to Environmental Hazards
description: The person's risk of exposure to hazards in their environent, including work, school, home, etc (Business ID: Entry 2729865)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Exposure Risk to Environmental Hazards.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the person's risk of exposure to hazards in their environent, including work, school, home, etc.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMEDCT codes for Exposure Risk to Environmental Hazards.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Exposure Risk to Environmental Hazards.)
